name: mlst

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Scan contig files against traditional PubMLST typing schemes

dependencies.name: any2fasta
dependencies.description: any2fasta: Convert various sequence formats to FASTA

dependencies.name: curl
dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax

dependencies.name: parallel
dependencies.description:
GNU parallel is a shell tool for executing jobs in parallel using one or
more computers. A job can be a single command or a small script that has
to be run for each of the lines in the input.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-file-which
dependencies.description: Perl implementation of the which utility as an API

dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: perl-moo
dependencies.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)
